info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 6:27PM CDT until July 29 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Richland County in southeastern Illinois... Clay County in south central Illinois... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 627 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sailor Springs to Norris City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Noble around 635 PM CDT. Olney and Dundas around 645 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Claremont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
